mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `CBBA` cb WHERE cb.CBBA06 = 0 AND cb.CBBA12 = 0 AND cb.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND cb.CBBA15 >= #{poritiry} AND cb.CBBA01 != #{cbba01} ORDER BY cb.CBBA15

SELECT * FROM `CBBA` cb WHERE cb.CBBA06 = 0 AND cb.CBBA12 = 0 AND cb.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND cb.CBBA15 >= #{newPriority}
AND cb.CBBA01 != #{cbba01} ORDER BY cb.CBBA15 DESC
SELECT * FROM `CBBA` cb WHERE cb.CBBA06 = 0 AND cb.CBBA12 = 0 AND cb.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND cb.CBBA15 >= #{oldPriority} ORDER BY cb.CBBA15
SELECT * FROM CBBA c WHERE c.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND c.CBBA06 =0 AND c.CBBA12= 0 order by c.CBBA15
SELECT * FROM CBBA c WHERE c.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND c.CBBA06 =0 AND c.CBBA12= 0 AND c.CBBA07 LIKE concat('%','GBSH', '%') order by c.CBBA15
SELECT * FROM CBBA c WHERE c.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND c.CBBA06 =0 AND c.CBBA12= 0 order by c.CBBA15 DESC

SELECT ba.CBBA15 as priority, ba.CBBA01 as id, ba.CBBA07 as orderNo, pb.CBPB12 as model, pb.CBPB08 as description, ba.CBBA09 as orderQty, ba.CBBA13 as makeQty, ba.CBBA12 as status, ba.CBBA10 as orderType, ba.CBBA11 as ShippedQty, pb.CBPB01 as goodsId, pb.CBPB10 as brand, ba.CBBA14 as useQty, (ba.CBBA09- ba.CBBA11) as currentOrderQty FROM `CBBA` ba LEFT JOIN CBPB pb ON pb.CBPB01 = ba.CBBA08 WHERE ba.CBBA06 = 0
AND ba.CBBA07 like concat('%', #{orderNo}, '%')
AND ba.CBBA07 in
#{cbwaItem}
AND pb.CBPB12 like concat('%', #{model}, '%')
AND pb.CBPB12 in
#{modelItem}
AND ba.CBBA12 = #{status}
AND ba.CBBA10 = #{orderClass}
order by ba.CBBA15 DESC
order by ba.CBBA15
order by ba.CBBA09 DESC
order by ba.CBBA09
order by ba.CBBA13
order by ba.CBBA13 DESC
order by ba.CBBA14
order by ba.CBBA14 DESC
order by ba.CBBA15
order by (ba.CBBA09- ba.CBBA11) DESC
order by (ba.CBBA09- ba.CBBA11) DESC

select
from `CBBA` where CBBA01 = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} for update
SELECT * FROM `CBBA` cb WHERE cb.CBBA06 = 0 AND cb.CBBA12 = 0 AND cb.CBBA08 = #{goodsId} AND cb.CBBA01 != #{cbba01} ORDER BY cb.CBBA15 ASC

SELECT * FROM `CBBA` cb WHERE cb.CBBA01 in
#{id}

SELECT distinct ba.CBBA07 as orderNo FROM `CBBA` ba WHERE ba.CBBA06 = 0
AND ba.CBBA07 like concat('%', #{orderNo}, '%')
